attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many people are commiting murder these days and because of how the law is,they are getting away with just that....murder,our prisons are over crowded and no body has nothing to fear anymore.
If you brought back this humane way of disposing convicted murderers,then people just might think twice about commiting such a serious crime.
This country cannot go on like it is doing.
bring back the gallows,il pull the trap door,all those sick minded people who kill others and especially children....everything always gets brushed to one side,the killers get 15 years and then they are released,but they still get treated like royalty in the prisons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
